content.en: Signed network analysis: Researchers have been exploring various algorithms to address different research questions related to mining and analyzing signed social networks. These algorithms, such as the FEC algorithm, heuristic algorithm, CDA SM algorithm, and others, are designed to improve community detection, clustering, and structure discovery in signed networks. By utilizing these algorithms, researchers aim to optimize community detection, uncover meaningful clusters, and accelerate the analysis of large-scale signed networks.
content.da: Analyser af signerede netværk: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at tackle forskellige forskningsspørgsmål relateret til minedrift og analyse af signerede sociale netværk. Disse algoritmer, såsom FEC-algoritmen, heuristisk algoritme, CDA SM-algoritmen og andre, er designet til at forbedre fællesskabsdetektion, klyngeanalyse og strukturoplevelse i signerede netværk. Ved at benytte disse algoritmer sigter forskerne mod at optimere fællesskabsdetektion, afdække meningsfulde klynger og fremskynde analysen af store signerede netværk.
